DOC.HEAD: Blast Rocks Refinery
DOC.TEXT: A powerful explosion rocked the storage tank area of an Exxon refinery Sunday. No injuries were immediately reported, but the explosion touched off a roaring fire and sent a plume of smoke 500 feet in the air, said East Baton Rouge Civil Defense spokesman Ed Wright. The tank storage area is near a pipeline, Wright said. The blast shattered windows in the surrounding area and the concussion could be felt as far away as 15 miles, residents said. A brief power outage was reported immediately after the explosion, Wright said.
